comment: The zero polynomial matrix over a ring represented as operation with "lifted scalars" (i.e. elements of the ring underlying the polynomial ring embedded into the polynomial ring by the scalar injection/algebraic scalars function ` algSc ` ). (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2019.)
